mapper.sql: output_value_id, sub_contractor_amount, migrant_work_amount, output_time, remark, create_user_id, create_time, last_modify_time
mapper.select:
select from output_value where 1 = 1
and date_format(output_time, '%Y-%m-%d') >= date_format(#{startTime, jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, '%Y-%m-%d')
and date_format(output_time, '%Y-%m-%d') <= date_format(#{endTime, jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, '%Y-%m-%d')
order by create_time desc
mapper.insert:
insert into output_value
output_value_id,
sub_contractor_amount,
migrant_work_amount,
output_time,
remark,
create_user_id,
create_time,
last_modify_time,
#{outputValueId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
#{subContractorAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
#{migrantWorkAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
#{outputTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{createUserId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{lastModifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
mapper.update:
update output_value
sub_contractor_amount = #{subContractorAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
migrant_work_amount = #{migrantWorkAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
output_time = #{outputTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
create_user_id = #{createUserId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
last_modify_time = #{lastModifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where output_value_id = #{outputValueId,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update output_value set sub_contractor_amount = #{subContractorAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, migrant_work_amount = #{migrantWorkAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, output_time = #{outputTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_user_id = #{createUserId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, last_modify_time = #{lastModifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where output_value_id = #{outputValueId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
